description:
This test validates the complete authentication lifecycle:
1. Navigate to ChatGPT
2. Open extension popup
3. Sign in with Google OAuth
4. Wait for Firebase decryption
5. Create a test profile
6. Verify profile exists
7. Delete the profile
8. Sign out

This is the foundational test - all other tests depend on this flow working.

steps.name: Execute mandatory flow (ChatGPT → Popup → OAuth → Decrypt)
